#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

  * All clock numbers shown in the tests are scheduler clock numbers. Core clock numbers cannot be directly measured.
  * A Multiprocessor has 2 warp schedulers
  * 32 CUDA cores are divided into 2 groups of 16
  * *Processing Unit Group*(PUG): A group of processing units that work together to serve a warp.
    * ALU: arithmetic and logic unit
    * XLU: extended ALU
    * FU:  floating-point unit
    * AGU: address generation unit
    * SU : special function unit
